EDIutils 0.0.0.9000

    • EML Template Helper

Add Personnel Element

add_personnel.Rd

Adds personel according to EML standards

add_personnel(
  parent_element,
  first_name,
  last_name,
  email,
  role,
  orcid = NULL,
  organization = NULL
)

Arguments

parent_element

A list representing the EML project or dataset
first_name

Person's given name
last_name

Person's surname
email

Person's email address
role

Use "Creator" if you are one of the primary originators of the data. Other possible roles "Data Manager", "Field Technician", or "Assistant Researcher". There can be multiple personnel on a project with the same role.
orcid

ORCID iD is a persistent digital identifier for researchers, register at http://orcid.org/
organization

Person's employer or the entity they are associated with for this dataset or project

Examples

add_personnel(parent_element = list(),
              first_name = 'Katherine',
              last_name = "Johnson",
              email = 'kjohnson@nasa.gov',
              role = 'Creator',
              organization = 'NASA',
              orcid = '12345')
#> $contact
#> $contact$individualName
#> $contact$individualName$givenName
#> [1] "Katherine"
#> 
#> $contact$individualName$surName
#> [1] "Johnson"
#> 
#> 
#> $contact$electronicMailAddress
#> [1] "kjohnson@nasa.gov"
#> 
#> $contact$organizationName
#> [1] "NASA"
#> 
#> 
#> $creator
#> $creator$individualName
#> $creator$individualName$givenName
#> [1] "Katherine"
#> 
#> $creator$individualName$surName
#> [1] "Johnson"
#> 
#> 
#> $creator$electronicMailAddress
#> [1] "kjohnson@nasa.gov"
#> 
#> $creator$organizationName
#> [1] "NASA"
#> 
#> $creator$`@id`
#> [1] "12345"
#> 
#> 

add_personnel(parent_element = list(),
              first_name = "Edith",
              last_name = "Windsor",
              email = 'ewindsor@ibm.com',
              role = 'Data Manager',
              organization = 'IBM')
#> $associatedParty
#> $associatedParty$individualName
#> $associatedParty$individualName$givenName
#> [1] "Edith"
#> 
#> $associatedParty$individualName$surName
#> [1] "Windsor"
#> 
#> 
#> $associatedParty$electronicMailAddress
#> [1] "ewindsor@ibm.com"
#> 
#> $associatedParty$organizationName
#> [1] "IBM"
#> 
#> $associatedParty$role
#> [1] "Data Manager"
#> 
#>
